casinogames

Class Deck

  • java.lang.Object
    • casinogames.Deck

  • public class Deck
extends java.lang.Object
    Deck Object, representing a deck of play cards used for games.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Deck()
      Default constructor to generate a standard deck.
      Deck(Deck otherDeck)
      Copy a deck.
      Deck(int i)
      Generate an empty deck.
